item.description:
Pixar is back with another movie!

Update

I have the time of the movie, we are seeing the 6:05 non-3d version. 

I will be at the theater at 5:10 or so. We will head into the theater to get seats around 5:50.

I will be wearing my red hat with the meetup logo. If the movie is upstairs, I'll be waiting by the tables by the big window in the second floor lobby, and if it's downstairs I'll be behind the ropes across from the refreshment stand. Note that to get to the upstairs lobby, you have to buy a ticket.

If you miss the group before the movie, no worries, you can meet us after. We gather outside the doors of the room showing the movie afterwards. Then we head out for some munchies and drinkies.

I strongly encourage folks to buy tickets ahead of time at fandango.com.

?? Synopsis

Star racecar Lightning McQueen (voice of Owen Wilson) and the incomparable tow truck Mater (voice of Larry the Cable Guy) take their friendship to exciting new places in "Cars 2" when they head overseas to compete in the first-ever World Grand Prix to determine the world's fastest car. But the road to the championship is filled with plenty of potholes, detours and hilarious surprises when Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage. Torn between assisting Lightning McQueen in the high-profile race and towing the line in a top-secret spy mission, s action-packed journey leads him on an explosive chase through the streets of Japan and Europe, trailed by his friends and watched by the whole world. Adding to the fast-paced fun is a colorful new all-car cast that includes secret agents, menacing villains and international racing competitors. 

Trailers 'n' Stuff

item.name: Cars 2
